reviews.review_msg: I believe she is a good teacher. If you follow the writing steps which are provided by her, you will get a good grade. She is not a tough marker at all if you follow her instruction.

I WAS excited to take this class. She is very confusing and does not tell you what she wants. Ask for help and you will be more confused then before. So many weekly quizzes and assignments. You only receive feedback on one of the papers. No cheat sheet for the final but she marked fairly easy on all the assignments except the final.
fantastic course. super interesting and fair marking.

Ian was an awesome teacher. he was very into what he was doing. although he didnt mark the midterm, final or term project my TA Elizabeth was amazing. she was very helpful and responded to emails and office hours always available!! best teacher i had so far and best class i had so far for a geo major

Wanna bad grade? Take this guy.  Tutorials are a total waste of time and have nothing to do with lectures.  Marking is not conducted fairly.The prof and the TAs mark your paper and then all give you inconsistent marks.
